
{{alias}}( x )
    Computes the arctangent of a single-precision floating-point number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Arctangent (in radians).

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 0.0 )
    0.0

    See Also
    --------
